医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Sphere Fluidics 任命 Graeme Daniels 博士为销售和营销副总裁高级领导团队的任命加强了公司持续增长的计划，以推进其商业目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Dr-Graeme-Daniels-as-Vice-President-of-Sales-and-Marketing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Sphere-Fluidics-appoints-Dr-Graeme-Daniels-as-Vice-President-of-Sales-and-Marketing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3838a40-585c-44c8-a81f-1fe101869f3a Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:59:00 -0500 Sphere Fluidics appoints Dr. Graeme Daniels as Vice President of Sales and Marketing
日本专利局维持 Charpentier/Doudna CRISPR 关键专利专利JP6692856因无效挑战而第二次维持原判。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Key-CharpentierDoudna-CRISPR-patent-upheld-by-Japan-Patent-Office.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Key-CharpentierDoudna-CRISPR-patent-upheld-by-Japan-Patent-Office.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83107e32-f283-420e-b9f6-2463e1226d5a Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:50:00 -0500 Key Charpentier/Doudna CRISPR patent upheld by Japanese Patent Office
AGA 发布第一个关于储袋炎管理的综合循证指南美国胃肠病学协会 (AGA) 发布了第一个关于储袋炎治疗的综合循证指南，储袋炎是溃疡性结肠炎患者在结肠切除手术后最常见的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AGA-releases-the-first-compressive-evidence-based-guideline-on-management-of-pouchitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AGA-releases-the-first-compressive-evidence-based-guideline-on-management-of-pouchitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e0109f1-7ca2-43d6-8068-a2a59eed3c11 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:44:44 -0500 AGA releases the first comprehensive evidence-based guideline on management of pouchitis
UCL 科学家从 1 型糖尿病大挑战赛中获得 997,000 英镑伦敦大学学院免疫与移植研究所 (IIT) 的科学家是从 1 型糖尿病大挑战赛中获得 997,000 英镑的团队的一员，该挑战赛是由史蒂夫·摩根基金会、英国糖尿病协会和 JDRF 共同参与的新合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/UCL-scientists-receive-c2a3997000-from-the-Type-1-Diabetes-Grand-Challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/UCL-scientists-receive-c2a3997000-from-the-Type-1-Diabetes-Grand-Challenge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d8e1ac8-2c16-496a-be95-1f981804c43a Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:41:38 -0500 UCL scientists receive £997,000 from the Type 1 Diabetes Grand Challenge
具有人性化免疫系统的小鼠测试新的癌症治疗方法，该方法蒙蔽免疫细胞对身体自我识别系统的影响研究人员研究了针对人类肿瘤相关巨噬细胞（TAM）的体内药物的抗癌作用。在人源化小鼠模型中，他们测试了人类信号调节蛋白α（SIRPα）抗体用于癌症免疫治疗的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Mice-with- humanized-immune-systems-test-new-cancer-therapeutic-approach-that-blindfolds-immune-cells-to-the-bodye28099s-自我识别系统.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Mice-with- humanized-immune-systems-test-new-cancer-therapeutic-approach-that-blindfolds-immune-cells-to-the-bodye28099s-自我识别系统.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2d6627a-a2ab-44b0-878e-1ba092033c65 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:28:00 -0500 Mice with humanized immune systems test new cancer therapeutic approach that blindfolds immune cells to the body’s self-recognition system
当一次快速的远程医疗就诊除了带来大笔账单之外还带来多重惊喜时2022 年 9 月，来自皇后区的艾丽丝·格林布拉特 (Elyse Greenblatt) 结束卢旺达之旅回国，却带来了一份相当不受欢迎的礼物：持续的拥堵。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/When-a-quick-telehealth-visit-yields-multiple-surprises-beyond-a-big-bill.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/When-a-quick-telehealth-visit-yields-multiple-surprises-beyond-a-big-bill.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c750488-5b6f-411e-9246-1fcc0342093c Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:21:55 -0500 When a quick telehealth visit yields multiple surprises beyond a big bill
面临死亡的患者选择了救生心脏装置——但风险有多大？由于年龄太大、病情太重，无法进行心脏移植，阿维德·赫尔曼面临着一个选择：在他的心脏中植入一个机械泵，这可能会让他活几年，或者什么也不做，几乎肯定会在一年内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Patients-faceing-death-are-opting-for-a-life saving-heart-device-e28094-but-at-what-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Patients-faceing-death-are-opting-for-a-life saving-heart-device-e28094-but-at-what-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=600ba74d-dd6b-451e-96ea-9f4ecf079c8a Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:19:51 -0500 Patients facing death are opting for a lifesaving heart device — but at what risk?
新导乐福利“改变”加州妈妈的生活当米娅·布鲁默发现自己怀上了第四个孩子时，她想要一次不同的分娩经历。她想要感到被赋予权力、了解情况并被倾听——她发现在她早年出生时缺乏这些元素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/New-doula-benefit-e28098life-changinge28099-for-California-mom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/New-doula-benefit-e28098life-changinge28099-for-California-mom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b152165-89b5-4efd-a2f4-ca3ca238f69e Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:16:14 -0500 New doula benefit ‘life-changing’ for California mom
探索用于检测开发和优化的仪器在本次采访中，FORMULATRIX 液体处理助理总监 Michael Nilsson 与 News Medical 讨论了简化检测开发和优化以及可用于最大限度降低成本的不同仪器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Exploring-instruments-for-assay-development-and-optimization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Exploring-instruments-for-assay-development-and-optimization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57506a3e-9f8a-40d1-bea1-ebaab9c2fa79 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:06:00 -0500 Exploring instruments for assay development and optimization
研究表明酒精会损害面部不对称检测，但知觉扭曲不会导致“啤酒眼镜”研究人员研究了现实世界中的酗酒对一组面部刺激下的面部吸引力和对称性判断的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-suggests-alcohol-impairs-face-asymmetry-detection-but-perceptual- Distortion-does-not-contribute-to-the-e28098beer-goggles。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-suggests-alcohol-impairs-face-asymmetry-detection-but-perceptual- Distortion-does-not-contribute-to-the-e28098beer-goggles。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b1f622d-2190-4d25-a669-131c44302809 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 05:51:00 -0500 Study suggests alcohol impairs face asymmetry detection, but perceptual distortion does not contribute to the ‘beer goggles'
